# Electric Forklift Truck Bid Solicitation

## Solicitation Reference Number
Reference Number: cb-106-2891963
Solicitation Number: W8476-256925/A.

## Overview
The Department of National Defence seeks proposals from pre-qualified Suppliers for the supply of Electric Forklift Trucks, specifically eight (8) Reach & Tiering, Stand Up Rider, Electric Motor Driven Forklift Trucks (Group 3A, Configuration A and C) and one (1) Electric Stand-Up Rider, Counterbalance Forklift Truck (Group 3B, Configuration A) with training and related items. The requested delivery date is 180 days after receipt of the order.

## Procurement
This bid solicitation process is reserved for Suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL. Suppliers who wish to participate must have an active SA in place. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with Suppliers on any procurement.

## Notice
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. This solicitation is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the RFSA E60HS-21FRKL.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

## Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact:
Marie-Claude Théorêt
Phone: (000) 000-0000
Email: marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca

## Closing Date
Tender closing date: 2024-12-03T14:00:00.

You can view the original text [on the government's website](link-to-gov-website).
